name: resampling
label: Resampling TS
description: Resamples, with the selected period, each Time series from the selected list. Input timeseries shall be periodic with the metadata 'qual_ref_period' present.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: the value defining the resampling period (unit : ms)
parameters.label: Period

parameters.name: adding_method
parameters.description: UPSAMPLING - method used to add new points while upsampling time series
parameters.label: Adding method

parameters.name: timestamp_position
parameters.description: DOWNSAMPLING - Timestamp position of new points generated by aggregation in the resampling period interval (BEG=BEGIN, MID=MIDDLE)
parameters.label: Timestamp position

parameters.name: aggregation_method
parameters.description: DOWNSAMPLING - Aggregation method used to compute new points values (MED=MEDIAN, AVG=AVERAGE)
parameters.label: Aggregation method

outputs.name: result
outputs.label: TS list
outputs.description: The list of TSUIDs/FuncId  referencing the resampled Time series.
